channel.title: photos on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in photos on Joost Plattel

item.title: 8:36pm - 2021
item.description: Long overdue, and it’s missing more photos then I’d like, here’s the 8:36pm video of 2021! Thanks to Quinten Swagerman with helping out making it into a video! (Switching to a new mac broke the old After Effects I was still using…) Onto another year!

item.title: 8:36pm - 2020 & Planning January
item.description: As 2020 is over and 2021 is just beginning I once return to the yearly habits that I’ve grown into doing. One of them is completing the Year Compass together with my girlfriend. To other was stuck for a while to the fact that OS X Catalina only supports 64 bit applications, which sucks if you run an outdated version of After Effects. I had to ask my brother to render the yearly movie of all my 8:36pm photos and thankfully he did, so without further ado, here it is:

item.title: Celebrating 10 years of 8:36pm
item.description: Today marks something special. Ten years ago, inspired by Buster Benson I started taking a picture at 8:36pm every day. A simple thing you might think, but in the end I kept doing it and to this day I still do. Keeping a habit for 10 years makes it a bit extraordinairy and I can say I will continue taking a picture! Below you will find this years movie of all the photos I took.

item.title: QS Amsterdam Recap #1
item.description: On 20 september the first Quantified Self Amsterdam Meetup took place in het volkskrantgebouw. More then 60 people attended and we had guests from Germany and France! A full recap can be found on the main QS blog and the videoâ€™s on vimeo. Sebastiaan ter Burg provided the video/photo capture and Kees Plattel made a wonderful intro! I really enjoyed this amazing meetup with interesting talks! If you are interested sign up for our meetup group and we will let you know when the next event is!
